column1: Description: Secondary pupil–teacher ratio - government schools
Source: Education statistics abstracts 2010–2013 – Ministry of Education
On the 'Data-wide-value' sheet, we have provided the indicator in a wide format. The values you see listed there are from the 'value' column.
